mapper.select: /* selectPostList */ SELECT A.POST_SN , A.POST_TITLE , A.REG_DT , (SELECT FILE_USER_NM FROM TB_FILE F WHERE F.FILE_DATA_SN = A.POST_SN AND F.USE_STATE = 'Y' AND F.FILE_CONTENT_CD = 'main') AS FILE_USER_NM_MAIN , (SELECT FILE_PATH FROM TB_FILE F WHERE F.FILE_DATA_SN = A.POST_SN AND F.USE_STATE = 'Y' AND F.FILE_CONTENT_CD = 'main') AS FILE_PATH_MAIN FROM TB_BOARD_POST A WHERE A.USE_STATE = 'Y' AND A.DISPLAY_YN = 'Y' AND A.BOARD_ID = #{board_id} ORDER BY A.POST_SN DESC LIMIT #{page_size} OFFSET #{page_offset}
/* selectPostCount */ SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM TB_BOARD_POST A WHERE A.USE_STATE = 'Y' AND A.DISPLAY_YN = 'Y' AND A.BOARD_ID = #{board_id}

/* selectTopFile */ SELECT (SELECT FILE_USER_NM FROM TB_FILE F WHERE F.FILE_DATA_SN = A.POST_SN AND F.USE_STATE = 'Y' AND F.FILE_CONTENT_CD = 'main') AS FILE_NAME , (SELECT FILE_PATH FROM TB_FILE F WHERE F.FILE_DATA_SN = A.POST_SN AND F.USE_STATE = 'Y' AND F.FILE_CONTENT_CD = 'main') AS FILE_PATH FROM TB_BOARD_POST A WHERE A.USE_STATE = 'Y' AND A.DISPLAY_YN = 'Y' AND A.BOARD_ID = #{board_id} ORDER BY A.POST_SN DESC LIMIT 1
